Question.Subject: Where can I get nice template for my blog?
Question.Content: For blogger and tumbir. Something black, but girlish. Something mysterious-ish. im fine with any nice ones you can recommend.
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Hei, I am not sure which category your blog belongs.
You can avail free Blogger templates from: http://btemplates.com http://blogger-templates.blogspot.com/ http://mashable.com/2007/09/13/blogger-templates/
For tumblr http://www.tumblr.com/themes/
